<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.AuthorBooksScript</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AuthorBooksScript</name><script><![CDATA[var AuthorBooksScript = Class.create();
AuthorBooksScript.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getAuthorsWithBooks: function() {
        // Create an array to store all authors with their details and books
        var authorsWithBooks = [];

        // Create a GlideRecord object for the Author table
        var authorGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_author');
        authorGR.query();

        // Iterate through the Author records
        while (authorGR.next()) {
            var author = {
                fullName: authorGR.getValue('full_name') || 'Unknown',
                authorImage: authorGR.getValue('author_image') ? '/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=' + authorGR.getValue('author_image') : '',
                aboutTheAuthor: authorGR.getValue('about_the_author') || 'No details available',
                booksWritten: authorGR.getValue('books_written') || 'Unknown',
                books: []
            };

            // Create a GlideRecord object for the Book Definition table
            var bookGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book');
            bookGR.addQuery('author', authorGR.getUniqueValue());
            bookGR.query();

            // Iterate through the Book records for the current author
            while (bookGR.next()) {
                var book = {
                    title: bookGR.getValue('title') || 'Unknown',
                    coverImage: bookGR.getValue('cover_image') ? '/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=' + bookGR.getValue('cover_image') : '/NoBookImage.jpg'
                };
                author.books.push(book);
            }

            // Add the author with their books to the result array
            authorsWithBooks.push(author);
        }

        return authorsWithBooks;
    },

    type: 'AuthorBooksScript'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-19 05:50:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>a8ea004393fe8210ef267c5efaba108a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AuthorBooksScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a8ea004393fe8210ef267c5efaba108a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-19 05:50:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
